content: I've been practicing yoga for about 6 months now, and I've noticed significant improvements in my flexibility and balance. I'm excited to try out some new Vinyasa flow and yin yoga videos on YouTube, and I'm looking forward to incorporating some of the tips you provided to improve my warrior II pose. I've also been experimenting with different breathing techniques, such as alternate nostril breathing and kapalabhati breathing, which I learned from a yoga app I've been using. Do you have any recommendations for yoga apps or online resources that can help me deepen my practice and learn more about yoga philosophy and breathwork?
